name: Idli
description: Soft, fluffy steamed rice cakes served with coconut chutney and sambar. A light and healthy breakfast classic from South India.

name: Dosa
description: Crispy, golden rice crepe served hot with chutneys and sambar. A perfect blend of crunch and flavor for any meal of the day.

name: Vada
description: Crispy lentil fritters with a soft, fluffy inside. Best enjoyed dunked in sambar or paired with fresh coconut chutney.

name: Upma
description: Savory semolina porridge cooked with onions, curry leaves, and mild spices. A warm and comforting South Indian breakfast dish.

name: Pongal
description: Creamy rice and moong dal cooked with ghee, pepper, and cashews. A wholesome dish perfect for mornings or festive occasions.
